/* fileAttachDAO.fileAttachList */
SELECT seq as atchFileId, boardnoticeseq as boardNoticeSeq, boardnoticegubun as boardNoticeGubun, downloadcount as downloadCount, originalfilename as orignlFileNm, originalfilenameonly as originalFileNameOnly, originalfilenameext as fileExtsn, savedfilename as streFileNm, savedfilepath as fileStreCours, displayorder as displayOrder, registuser as registUser, registdatetime as registDateTime, updateuser as updateUser, updatedatetime as updateDateTime FROM CIS_FILEATTACH WHERE boardnoticegubun = #{boardNoticeGubun} AND boardnoticeseq = #{boardNoticeSeq}

/* fileAttachDAO.fileAttachDetail */
SELECT seq as atchFileId, boardnoticeseq as boardNoticeSeq, boardnoticegubun as boardNoticeGubun, downloadcount as downloadCount, originalfilename as orignlFileNm, originalfilenameonly as originalFileNameOnly, originalfilenameext as fileExtsn, savedfilename as streFileNm, savedfilepath as fileStreCours, displayorder as displayOrder, registuser as registUser, registdatetime as registDateTime, updateuser as updateUser, updatedatetime as updateDateTime FROM CIS_FILEATTACH WHERE seq = #{fileSeq}

/* fileAttachDAO.fileAttachGubnDetail */
SELECT seq as atchFileId, boardnoticeseq as boardNoticeSeq, boardnoticegubun as boardNoticeGubun, downloadcount as downloadCount, originalfilename as orignlFileNm, originalfilenameonly as originalFileNameOnly, originalfilenameext as fileExtsn, savedfilename as streFileNm, savedfilepath as fileStreCours, displayorder as displayOrder, registuser as registUser, registdatetime as registDateTime, updateuser as updateUser, updatedatetime as updateDateTime FROM CIS_FILEATTACH WHERE boardnoticegubun = #{boardNoticeGubun} AND boardnoticeseq = #{boardNoticeSeq} AND uploadGubn = #{gubn}

/* fileAttachDAO.fileAttachMaxSeq */
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQ)+1,0) AS maxSeq from CIS_FileAttach
